Name: Orbit
About the game: Orbit is a Multiplayer Only Platformer game. Battle against other Players across a variety of different planets. Gain the advantage by earning XP and looting each Planet before your opponents do! Features: - Full Multiplayer/Online Support - Orbit is currently a Multiplayer only game. Players can easily host and join other games at the click of a button. - Random Procedural Generation - Planets are randomly generated meaning levels/maps are different each round. - Customisation - Characters can be customised with a variety of different Armours and Colours. - XP/Leveling System - Earn XP by looting and fighting. This can then be used to upgrade stats of your choice, depending on your own playstyle. - Weapons - From a 'Giant Battery' to a 'Snake-Whip', there's many weapons to find to defeat your enemies with. - Abilities/Finishers - Each weapon has a 'Special' attack linked with it. Save these attacks for just the right time to surprise opponents! - Retro-Like Aesthetic - The game is heavily inspired from 16-bit games and follows a similar art style. Join the Discord!:
